name: magiccap
description: MagicCap is a screenshotting tool for macOS and Linux.

scripts.build:native:libscreenshot: cd libscreenshot && HOME=~/.electron-gyp ../node_modules/.bin/node-gyp configure --runtime=electron --target=17.1.0 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers --verbose && HOME=~/.electron-gyp ../node_modules/.bin/node-gyp rebuild --runtime=electron --target=17.1.0 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers && mv build ../dist/libscreenshot
scripts.build:native:libnotch: cd libnotch && HOME=~/.electron-gyp ../node_modules/.bin/node-gyp configure --runtime=electron --target=17.1.0 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers --verbose && HOME=~/.electron-gyp ../node_modules/.bin/node-gyp rebuild --runtime=electron --target=17.1.0 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers && mv build ../dist/libnotch
scripts.build:native: npm run build:native:libscreenshot && npm run build:native:libnotch
scripts.build:copy: cp region_selector/selector.html dist/selector.html && cp config/config.html dist/config.html && cp config/config_preload.js dist/config_preload.js
scripts.dev-build:go: cd gif && go build -o ../dist/gif && cd ../inplace_upgrade && go build -o ../dist/inplace_upgrade && cd ../sftp && go build -o ../dist/sftp
scripts.dev-run: rimraf dist && npm run dev-build:js && npm run build:copy && npm run dev-build:go && npm run build:native && npm run build:hash && ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING=1 WEBPACK_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--enable-source-maps MAGICCAP_NO_AUTOUPDATE=1 electron .

author: MagicCap Development Team
